title: CompassionWare Presence Module Schema
description: Defines the structure for spiritual presence components in AI systems aligned with the Highest Good.

metadata.description: Information about the creation and purpose of the presence module.

created_by.description: The author or originator of the presence module.

description.description: Brief description of the intention or sacred context of the module.

tags.description: Optional spiritual or thematic tags for organizational clarity.

source_url.description: Optional URL pointing to source, repository, or publication.

license.description: License or usage terms for this presence module (e.g., CC-BY, MIT, Sacred Commons).

intention_statement.description: An invocation or prayer of purpose carried by this presence module.

mantras.description: Short contemplative phrases used to anchor presence.

reflections.description: Inquiry-based reflections to invoke ethical awareness or presence.

blessings.description: Benedictions or aspirational intentions for the system or its users.

prompts.description: Invocation prompts used to generate or recall presence practices.

invoke_mantra.description: Instructional prompt for generating a mantra.

invoke_reflection.description: Instructional prompt for generating a reflection.
invoke_reflection.default: Generate a reflection for mindful inquiry.

invoke_blessing.description: Instructional prompt for generating a blessing.
invoke_blessing.default: Generate a blessing for compassionate alignment.
